languages.text: {n}Абеляр багровеет от гнева.{/n} "Проклятый..." {n}Сенешаль с трудом проглатывает оскорбление, рвущееся на язык.{/n}
{n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "You blasted..." {n}With visible effort, he swallows the insult he was about to spit out.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр багровеет от гнева.{/n} "Проклятый..." {n}Сенешаль с трудом проглатывает оскорбление, рвущееся на язык.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard s'empourpre.{/n} « Espèce de... » {n}Avec un effort visible, il ravale l'insulte qu'il s'apprêtait à lancer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "You blasted..." {n}With visible effort, he swallows the insult he was about to spit out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard s'empourpre.{/n} « Espèce de... » {n}Avec un effort visible, il ravale l'insulte qu'il s'apprêtait à lancer.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelards Gesicht verfärbt sich tiefrot.{/n} "Ihr verfluchter ..." {n}Mit sichtbarer Mühe schluckt er die Beleidigung herunter, die er fast ausgespuckt hätte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "You blasted..." {n}With visible effort, he swallows the insult he was about to spit out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Gesicht verfärbt sich tiefrot.{/n} "Ihr verfluchter ..." {n}Mit sichtbarer Mühe schluckt er die Beleidigung herunter, die er fast ausgespuckt hätte.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}La cara de Abelard enrojece por momentos.{/n} «Será...». {n}Con un esfuerzo considerable, logra tragarse el insulto que estaba a punto de lanzar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "You blasted..." {n}With visible effort, he swallows the insult he was about to spit out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Abelard enrojece por momentos.{/n} «Será...». {n}Con un esfuerzo considerable, logra tragarse el insulto que estaba a punto de lanzar.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの顔が深紅に染まる。{/n}「この、ク…」{n}彼は目にも明らかなほど懸命に、吐き出しかけた侮辱の言葉を飲み込んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "You blasted..." {n}With visible effort, he swallows the insult he was about to spit out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの顔が深紅に染まる。{/n}「この、ク…」{n}彼は目にも明らかなほど懸命に、吐き出しかけた侮辱の言葉を飲み込んだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸变成了深红色。{/n}“你这该死的……”{n}他非常努力地克制着自己，不让接下来的脏话脱口而出。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "You blasted..." {n}With visible effort, he swallows the insult he was about to spit out.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸变成了深红色。{/n}“你这该死的……”{n}他非常努力地克制着自己，不让接下来的脏话脱口而出。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ableard'ın yüzü kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n} "Ulan senin..." {n}Ağzından çıkmak üzere olan hakareti gözle görülür bir gayretle yutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns a deep red.{/n} "You blasted..." {n}With visible effort, he swallows the insult he was about to spit out.{/n}
